name: TacoRandomizer
0:
”Alexa, ask Taco Randomizer to make a taco.”
”Alexa, ask Taco Randomizer to build me a taco.”
”Alexa, ask Taco Randomizer which taco I should have.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: taco randomizer
des:
Are you in the mood for a taco but can't decide which type of taco to order? Have your tacos become dull and boring because you keep ordering the same old taco? If you need some taco-spiration let Taco Randomizer suggest a taco for you! Just say, "Alexa, ask Taco Randomizer to make a taco."

Alexa will build you a custom taco from a variety of ingredients. Will it be a soft taco, a crunchy taco, or maybe a crunchy taco wrapped in a soft taco? Will your taco have chicken, carne asada, carnitas, or seasoned ground beef? How about some cheese, onions, cilantro, or even bacon and barbeque sauce? Or, maybe something a bit unconventional like shredded kale, crushed tortilla chips, or cole slaw? You never know, the results might be delicious! 

Pro tip: Add a squeeze of lime and some hot sauce to your taco for a delectable meal!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
